responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain generative AI solutions to support enterprise use cases.
Collaborate with other data scientists, engineers, and product teams to integrate generative AI solutions into business applications.
Monitor the performance of generative AI tools, contribute to documentation, code reviews, and knowledge sharing with other teams and stakeholders.
Collaborate with the AI literacy team to provide generative AI training and guidance to other staff.
required_skills: Hands-on experience developing and deploying generative AI tools in production environments.
Solid understanding of transformer architectures, LLMs, and generative model training or fine-tuning.
Expertise in evaluating performance, security, and bias for generative AI tools.
Strong foundation in prompt engineering best practices, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), and vector databases.
Proficiency with general database concepts and SQL.
Experience using containers with continuous integration and deployment (CICD) technologies.
preferred_skills: Experience working in an Agile environment.
education_requirements: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, data science, quantitative social science, or a related field.
experience_required: Minimum 5 years of related experience in machine learning or data science, with at least 1 year working directly on generative AI projects.
